name: Chikoku no Mokushiroku
storyline: Lazy shut-in Seryozha is always late to everything, no matter what. Although it seems his friend has finally had enough, so if he's late one more time, Seryozha's very life could be on the line. Good thing he woke up in time, but there's one little problem…he's locked in his house and can't get out.
summary: Chikoku no Mokushiroku is a single player adventure RPG about a man who's locked in his house and can't get out.
